DashboardSectionFirstParagraph: Calculations are based on latest data provided by the National Bank of Poland.
DashboardSectionSecondParagraph: Values presented on the website form median of representative currencies.
AboutSectionHowToUseFirstParagraph: CConverter is an open-source project created by Codrill. Having at your disposal 150 currencies from all over the world, conversions become very simple.
AboutSectionHowToUseSecondParagraph: It only takes choosing currencies you're interested in and specify the number. This application will automatically convert given amount, basing on adequate and official exchange rates.
AboutSectionNBP: In order to guarantee our users reliable and official exchange rates we use data provided by the National Bank of Poland, where the most popular values are upgraded every working day and more exotic ones every Wednesday.
AboutSectionRWDFirstParagraph: Our converter is adjusted to be used on any device. Do you need a quick convertion? This app works flawlessly on both mobile phones and tablets.
AboutSectionRWDSecondParagraph: CConverter is continuously developed. We therefore encourage you to share your thoughts using our application form.
ContactFormRegexUsername: Please provide your name and surname
ContactFormRegexMessage: Message must contain from 20 to 500 characters
